mapper.update: UPDATE inspection_process_record_header set inspection_process_record_header_code=#{inspection_process_record_header_code}, process_code=#{process_code}, pipe_no=#{pipe_no},operation_time=#{operation_time},operator_no=#{operator_no}, upload_files=#{upload_files},remark=#{remark},result=#{result},mill_no=#{mill_no} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from inspection_process_record_header o inner join process_info pc on pc.process_code=o.process_code left join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=o.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pro on c.project_no=pro.project_no left join pipe_status s on s.status_code=p.status
AND o.pipe_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pipe_no},'%')
AND o.operator_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operator_no},'%')
AND o.mill_no =#{mill_no}
AND o.process_code=#{process_code}
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
select * from inspection_process_record_header where id=#{id}

Select o.* from inspection_process_record_header o left join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=o.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pro on c.project_no=pro.project_no WHERE pro.project_no=#{project_no} AND o.mill_no=#{mill_no} AND format(c.od,3)=format(#{od},3) AND format(c.wt,3)=format(#{wt},3)
AND process_code=#{process_code}
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(#{end_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY o.id DESC
SELECT * from inspection_process_record_header where pipe_no=#{pipe_no} and process_code=#{process_code} order by operation_time desc LIMIT 1

select * from inspection_process_record_header
AND id < (select id from inspection_process_record_header where pipe_no = #{pipe_no} order by id desc limit 1)
AND result ='1' and mill_no=#{mill_no} and process_code=#{process_code}
order by id desc limit 1

select ib.id,ib.inspection_process_record_header_code,ic.operation_time as coatingtime, ib.operation_time as blasttime from inspection_process_record_header ib inner join inspection_process_record_header ic on ib.pipe_no=ic.pipe_no where ic.operation_time >=ib.operation_time AND ib.pipe_no=#{pipe_no} and ib.process_code=#{process_code} and ic.id=#{id} order by ib.operation_time desc limit 1

SELECT o.*,rditem.*, SUM(CASE item_code WHEN 'sample_cutoff_length' THEN item_value END) AS 'sample_cutoff_length', SUM(CASE item_code WHEN 'sample_pipe_cutoff_length' THEN item_value END) AS 'sample_pipe_cutoff_length' from inspection_process_record_header o inner join inspection_process_record_item rditem on rditem.inspection_process_record_header_code= o.inspection_process_record_header_code left join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=o.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pro on c.project_no=pro.project_no
AND o.result='1' AND o.process_code='coating_sampling' AND ( rditem.item_code='sample_cutoff_length' or rditem.item_code='sample_pipe_cutoff_length' ) AND c.external_coating=#{external_coating} AND c.internal_coating=#{internal_coating} AND pro.project_no=#{project_no} AND format(c.od,3)=format(#{od},3) AND format(c.wt,3)=format(#{wt},3)
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(#{end_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
